descriptionHtml:
For best results, use with my other mod: Everybody is a potential follower. Get it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25814

Basically, this is just like hiring a mercenary (Such as Jenassa), but you can now hire everyone, should they be an \'acquaintance\', I.E, they have a relationshiprank of 0 with the player.
They will also fight with you, if they are in the PotentialFollowerFaction, of which there are only a few NPCs in (With vanilla Skyrim. My \"Everybody is followable\" mod adds everyone to the required factions with no conflicts whatsoever).

Currently, the mod charges the Player 300 gold.
author: Fifty Tifty
